items.title: What is Horizon?
items.content: Horizon is an innovative platform that empowers users to seamlessly connect with service providers and access a diverse range of services. By registering on the app, individuals can showcase the services they offer, creating a virtual marketplace for users seeking specific solutions. Users can effortlessly browse through the listed services, connect with providers, and even enlist for desired services, fostering a dynamic community of service seekers and providers. Horizon's user-friendly interface and robust features streamline the process of finding and offering services, making it a go-to platform for those seeking convenience and efficiency in the service industry.

items.title: How do I register on Horizon?
items.content: To register on Horizon, simply go to register page, create an account with your email, and follow the easy on-screen prompts to set up your profile.

items.title: Can I list multiple services on Horizon?
items.content: Absolutely! Horizon allows you to showcase a variety of services you offer. After registering, click to create new service button on the app bar to add the services you provide.

items.title: How do users contact me for my services?
items.content: Users can easily reach out to you by using the in-app messaging feature. Once they find your service listing, there will be an option to initiate contact and discuss their specific requirements.

items.title: Is there a verification process for service providers on Horizon?
items.content: Yes, Horizon prioritizes user safety. We have a verification process to ensure the authenticity of service providers. You may be required to submit relevant documentation during the registration process.

items.title: Can I review and rate services as a user on Horizon?
items.content: Absolutely! We encourage users to share their experiences. After receiving a service, you can leave a review and rate the provider. This helps maintain a trustworthy community within Horizon.

items.title: How do I enlist for a service on Horizon?
items.content: To enlist for a service, navigate to the service listing, review the details, and use the provided contact option to reach out to the service provider. Discuss the specifics and finalize the arrangement.

items.title: Are there any fees associated with using Horizon?
items.content: During the beta period of the development, using Horizon is free. Plans may change in the future.

items.title: Can I edit my service listings after they are published?
items.content: Yes, you have the flexibility to edit your service listings at any time. Simply go to your profile, find the service you want to modify, and click on the edit option.

items.title: How does Horizon prioritize service listings for users?
items.content: Horizon uses a smart algorithm that considers various factors, including user ratings and reviews, to present relevant and high-quality service listings. This ensures users find the best services for their needs.
